tool.name: Functional Annotation
tool.description: of variants in a VCF file

param.name: u
param.label: Maximum distance before a gene to be classified as Upstream

param.name: d
param.label: Maximum distance after a gene to be classified as Downstream

param.name: sd
param.label: Initial basepairs of an intron that should be considered as splice donor

param.name: sa
param.label: Final basepairs of an intron that should be considered as splice acceptor

param.name: si
param.label: Initial or final basepairs of an intron that should be considered as part of the splice region

param.name: se
param.label: Initial or final basepairs of an exon that should be considered as part of the splice region

tool.help:
**What it does**
This module annotates genomic variants in a VCF file using a custonm GFF3 gene description, it generates a VCF file including the functional information related with each variant.
-----
.. class:: infomark
For details about this tool, please visit https://sourceforge.net/projects/ngsep/
